statement.p: Explain why the vectors \left[\begin{array}{r} 2 \\ -5 \\ 4 \\ 2 \\ -1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -6 \\ -5 \\ -1 \\ -4 \\ -4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -5 \\ -6 \\ 0 \\ -1 \\ 1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 30 \\ 22 \\ 7 \\ 16 \\ 9 \end{array}\right] , \text{ and } \left[\begin{array}{r} 18 \\ 15 \\ 3 \\ 12 \\ 12 \end{array}\right] are linearly dependent or linearly independent.

answer.p: The vectors \left[\begin{array}{r} 2 \\ -5 \\ 4 \\ 2 \\ -1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -6 \\ -5 \\ -1 \\ -4 \\ -4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -5 \\ -6 \\ 0 \\ -1 \\ 1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 30 \\ 22 \\ 7 \\ 16 \\ 9 \end{array}\right] , \text{ and } \left[\begin{array}{r} 18 \\ 15 \\ 3 \\ 12 \\ 12 \end{array}\right] are linearly dependent .
